nodes.text: The luxury liner Stellar Vista had a captain. During Berch Teller's insurgent campaign in 14 BBY, the Stellar Vista was dragged out of hyperspace and rammed an Imperial warship, critically damaging the liner. A prototype Immobilizer 418 cruiser's gravity well projector had malfunctioned during an operation to recapture Moff Wilhuff Tarkin's stolen corvette Carrion Spike, resulting in a massive hyperspace accident that claimed 1,100 lives aboard the Stellar Vista. The captain then called for assistance.
The captain was first mentioned in the 2015 canon novel Tarkin, by James Luceno.
